message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us and is estimated to be worth $1,500,000 to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer it to you at a special price. Our proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,250,000. This offer reflects our commitment to making this exceptional product accessible while ensuring a fair return for our investment. We believe this price offers a mutually beneficial solution. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
